Author: Caraxi
Name: Simple Tweaks
Description: Collection of simple ideas that are too small to warrant their own plugin.
- Show average item level when examining other players.
- Remove the 'Casting' text from cast bar.
- Adjust the positioning of the ability name on target cast bars.
- Adjust the format of the game clocks to your liking.
- Remove the 'Community Finder' button from windows.
- Hide FC names from player name plates.
- Copy item names with a hotkey.
- Highlight expected status changes from food.
- Show ID of an item on its tooltip.
- Copy item name with a hotkey.
